Name: ContentPage
Description: Page that hosts a single content view.

Properties.Name: HideSoftInputOnTapped
Properties.Description: Hide soft keyboard when tapping the page content.

Properties.Name: SafeAreaEdges
Properties.Description: Controls which edges respect the device safe area.

Properties.Name: TitleView
Properties.Description: Custom view displayed in the navigation bar title area.

Constructors.Description: Creates a ContentPage and sets its title.
Creates a ContentPage with a title and children.
